1)

0b10010011 -> 1x2^7 + 0x2^6 + 0x2^5 + 1x2^4 + 0x2^3 + 0x2^2 + 1x2^1 + 1x2^0 = 147 = 0x93
0xD3AD -> 13x16^3 + 3x16^2 + 10x16^1 + 13x16^0 = 54189 = 0b1101001110101101
63 -> 3x16^1 + 15x16^0 = 0x3F = 0b00111111
0b00100100 -> 0x2^7 + 0x2^6 + 1x2^5 + 0x2^4 + 0x2^3 + 1x2^2 + 0x2^1 + 0x2^0 = 36 = 0x24
0xB33F -> 11x16^3 + 3x16^2 + 3x16^1 + 15x16^0 = 32452 = 45887 = 0b1011001100111111
0 = 0x10^0 = 0x0 = 0b0
39 = 2x16^1 + 3x16^0 = 0x23 = 0b00100011
0x7EC4 -> 7x16^3 + 14x16^2 + 12x16^1 + 4x16^0 = 32452 = 0b0111111011000100
437 -> 1x16^2 + 11x16^1 + 5x16^0 = 0x1B5 = 0b0001101101111

2)

2^16 = 64 Ki
2^34 = 16 Gi
2^27 = 128 Mi
2^61 = 2 Ei
2^43 = 8 Ti
2^47 = 128 Ti
2^36 = 64 Gi
2^58 = 256 Pi

3)

2 Ki = 2^11
256 Pi = 2^58
512 Ki = 2^19
64 Gi = 2^36
16Mi = 2^24
128 Ei = 2^67
